channel.title: Black textures
channel.description:
Ok, quite recently I've been having a problem in the SDK hammer editor, where textures appear as black in game. When I set mat_fullbright to 1 they reappear. Also, when I apply a cubemap to the same room, it reflects the pink and black checkered no-texture thing.
Any help would be appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
Didn’t want to create a new thread for a similar problem, but I will if no-one responds to this.

Now I have been having some trouble with func_door textures being black and odd. I created two func_doors beside eathother for a lift, but strangly the side faces to the rectangles have been completely black, and none of the faces have bullet holes after being shot. Can any one explain this or is more info required?

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
Thanks for the help everyone, i’ll try what you are saying when I get my hammer out.

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Metritutus
item.description:
Mangled*:

it will say prop in the texture name

Ah, an easy way to find them then.

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Metritutus:

Some textures are ‘model textures’ and they show up wrong compared to the others. I cannot remember how you can tell between them though.

it will say prop in the texture name

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Metritutus
item.description:
Some textures are ‘model textures’ and they show up wrong compared to the others. I cannot remember how you can tell between them though.

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Wasabi
item.description:
Are the textures on the wall textures intended for props? In which case they won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
Yeh, four of them. I didn’t have this problem until I switched to a certain texture, then every texture after was black. The light source lights the floor ceiling, but not the wall.

Read full topic

item.title: Black textures
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Have you got a light source in the room?

Type buildcubemaps in console, then restart the game and your cubemap will work.

I recommend fixing the textures before building cubemaps, or the cubemap will contain black textures.

Read full topic
